overview: Gonzalo is a co-founder of Axon Capital. Economit by education he has participated as senior manager in the finance direction of Grupo Ortiz Construcciones and Grupo TAU Inmobiliaria, before worked at Villalar & Asociados, designing transactions and managing cash flows in large real state operations in Spain. Previously was Senior Manager at Swedish Intentia Consulting, devoting his time to the design and launch of product centers, process reengineering, process optimization and IT implementation. He has advised mainly mid market companies such as MIT-Renfe, Pescanova or Binter Canarias
